short_summary: Repair and renovations of Highway 93 North and Highway 11, Banff and Jasper National Park
full_summary:
# Hwy 93N Pobokton & Hwy 11 Repairs and Renovation – Banff & Jasper National Park
*A Request for Proposal ( RFP )*

## Project Description

Parks Canada is seeking a contractor to undertake a highway maintenance project that includes full depth roadway replacement and paving works on sections of Hwy 93N Pobokton and Hwy 11 in Banff and Jasper National Parks.

## Project Specifications

Estimated project value: $5,001,001 and above
Taxes extra
The Contractor must complete the project by September 30, 2023

## Bid Submission Requirements

* Bids by email are preferred, but can also be submitted via facsimile.
* Bidders must use the government's electronic tendering service ( Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders ) for document retrieval and updates.
* Addenda and other notices will be posted on the Government of Canada's tendering service (canadabuys.canada.ca).
* Bidders must ensure their email attachments do not exceed 15 megabytes. If the email exceeds this size, it is the bidder's responsibility to send the bid in multiple emails, each properly labeled with the solicitation number, project name, and number of emails in the series (e.g., "1 of 2").

## Important Notes

* The only acceptable format for email addresses is soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca.
* Bid documents must be sent as attachments and not as links.
* Late submissions will be rejected.
* Bidders must carefully review the specifications and drawings for further details on project requirements.

## Enquiries

All technical and contractual questions must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority, with a copy of the Contracting Authority's response submitted to potential Bidders.

## Language

The Government of Canada is committed to equality for both official languages. Bidders can submit their bids in either English or French, and must ensure that their bid documents are also provided in both languages.
